message.content: {"id": "116829", "title": "Bug 116829: Label height doesn't change with label font modification.", "description": "Description: The label font size doesn't change immediately when it is modified.", "OB": "The label height remains the same after modifying the font size.", "EB": "The label height should adjust automatically to accommodate the new font size.", "SR": "To reproduce the issue:1. origin.input_prompt:

Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
